p: By 2050, suitable areas (RCP2.6 and RCP8.5) of N. jatamansi increased. Relative to the current situation, both ranges increased in RCP2.6 and RCP8.5 with a greater growth rate under RCP8.5. The scope of suitable areas in Qinghai and Tibet increased obviously and exhibited a trend of northward expansion. Suitable areas of N. chinensis under RCP2.6 and RCP8.5 emissions scenarios also increased compared to the current situation. The scope of suitable areas in western Sichuan Province and Tibet increased obviously and also exhibited a trend of northward expansion.
